 5: use Exception;
 6: use GuzzleHttp\Exception\ClientException;
 7: use Larabros\Elogram\Http\Response;
 8: 
 9: interface AdapterInterface
10: {
11:     /**
12:      * Sends a HTTP request using `$method` to the given `$uri`, with
13:      * `$parameters` if provided.
14:      *
15:      * Use this method as a convenient way of making requests with built-in
16:      * exception-handling.
17:      *
18:      * @param  string $method
19:      * @param  string $uri
20:      * @param  array $parameters
21:      *
22:      * @return Response
23:      *
24:      * @throws ClientException
25:      * @throws Exception If an invalid HTTP method is specified
26:      */
27:     public function request($method, $uri, array $parameters = []);
28: 
29:     /**
30:      * Paginates a `Response`. The pagination limit is set by `$limit` -
31:      * setting it to `null` will paginate as far as possible.
32:      *
33:      * @param Response  $response
34:      * @param int|null  $limit
35:      *
36:      * @return Response
37:      */
38:     public function paginate(Response $response, $limit = null);
39: }
